title: Complete Web Design from Figma to Webflow to Freelancing
description: 3 in 1 Course: Learn to design websites with Figma, build with Webflow, and make a living freelancing.

title: Introduction to Product Design
description: Learn the fundamentals of product design and gain an understanding of the design process from ideation to prototyping.

title: User Research and Analysis
description: Explore techniques for conducting user research and analyze data to inform and improve product design decisions.

title: Prototyping and Wireframing
description: Master the art of creating prototypes and wireframes to effectively communicate and test product design concepts.

title: Visual Design Principles
description: Develop a solid foundation in visual design principles, including typography, color theory, and layout techniques.

title: Interaction Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the principles of interaction design and create engaging user experiences through effective interface design.

title: Mobile App Design
description: Dive into the specifics of designing mobile apps, including user flows, screen layouts, and mobile UI best practices.

title: Design Thinking for Innovation
description: Learn how to apply design thinking methodologies to drive innovation and solve complex problems through human-centered design.

title: Designing for Web Accessibility
description: Discover the principles and techniques for creating inclusive and accessible web designs that can be enjoyed by all users.
